product_name: Stan's NoTubes All Mountain 29er Tubeless System Kit
long_description: Stan's NoTubes All Mountain 29er Tubeless System kit is designed to convert conventional 29er clincher rims into tubeless systems with either standard or tubeless tires. Tubeless setups help reduce weight, minimize pinch flats and punctures and allow you to use lower tire pressure for enhanced performance. Kit includes 2 molded rim strips with integrated Presta valves, 1 pint of Stan's Tire Sealant, 1 roll of Universal Kit tape, installation instructions and NoTubes decal. Rim strip dimensions are 65 in. x 26mm. Please note: this kit will fit some 29 in. mountain bike rims including but not limited to Mavic 520 Touring, Sun Rhyno Lite 29er and many 29er rims 25 - 28mm wide. See notubes.com for specific rim compatibility information.
short_description: Stan's NoTubes All Mountain 29er Tubeless System kit is designed to convert conventional 29er clincher rims into tubeless systems with either standard or tubeless tires.
